sentence: On the Democratic side of both races, Beck noted President Joe Biden is unlikely to endorse, even though gubernatorial candidates Nan Whaley and John Cranley – tied at 16% according to Emerson – need to chip away at the 7 in 10 undecided voters.
author: Ben Orner
title: Trump’s Ohio endorsement means more than Portman’s, NBC4 poll finds

sentence: The field includes two (or three) Republicans and two Democrats Republican: Joe Blystone Mike DeWine Jim Renacci Democrat: John Cranley Nan Whaley OHIO'S 8TH CONGRESSIONAL DISTRICT Ohio’s 8th Congressional District is up for grabs this year as well.
author: WLWT Digital Staff
title: Election guide 2022: Who's running for office in Ohio?

sentence: On the Democratic ballot, John Cranley, a former mayor of Cincinnati, and Nan Whaley, the outgoing mayor of Dayton, are vying to be the Democratic candidate for governor in the November general election.
author: Carol Simmons
title: Ohio voters face split primary
